text: “Kapena kuti musadzati: “Likadavumbulutsidwa buku kwa ife, ndithudi, tikadakhala oongoka kuposa iwo.” Choncho, chakudzerani chizindikiro kuchokera kwa Mbuye wanu, ndi chiongoko ndi mtendere. Kodi ndani woipitsitsa kwambiri kuposa amene watsutsa zizindikiro za Allah ndi kutembenukira kutali Nazo? Tidzawalipira amene akutembenukira kutali ndi zizindikiro zathu, chilango choipa, chifukwa cha kudziika kwawo kutali
